data.title: Precision Performance Sportswear
data.meta_description: Castore exists to create expertly engineered sportswear for every athlete worldwide – through precision performance features.
data.text:
Features:

Crew neckline

Regular fit: for a comfortable and classic look

Set-in short sleeves

Laser-cut ventilation for increased breathability

Halo eyelets for enhanced airflow

Bonded hem with contrast internal taping for a flat finish

Reflective Castore branding

The Men’s Ventilation Short Sleeve Training T Shirt is a streamlined garment for intense workouts. The anti-bacterial Otek finish wicks away moisture while laser-cut ventilation and halo eyelets provide airflow to stay cool. Complete with a bonded hem and cuff to reduce the overall weight and ensure nothing distracts from your best effort.

Best for Medium-impact training.

Style Code: CMB30501

Features:

88% Nylon 12% Elastane 95 GSM

Aertek™technology for enhanced sweat-wicking

Elasticated waistband with external drawcords

Side pockets for added convenience on the move

Castore branding at right thigh and back left thigh

Aertek branding at left thigh

Description:

Our Men’s Flow Lightweight 2-in-1 Shorts offer an extra layer of warmth to your kit, while wicking away sweat thanks to their Aertek technology – ideal for intense training out in the elements. Side pockets offer secure storage of essential belongings for added convenience on the move.

Features:

High-stretch, lightweight and breathable fabric

Otek technology to maintain freshness

Self-fabric pointed collar

Set-in short sleeves

Hem seam opening for increased mobility

Yarn-dyed stripe pattern

Castore branding at left chest and upper back

Hit the pinnacle of your game in our Men’s Yarn Dye Stripe Polo Top, engineered with high-stretch, breathable fabric for unrestricted swing movement. Our Otek technology ensures maintained garment freshness. Designed with a yarn-dyed stripe pattern so you can look and play the part on the course.

Best for Golf.

Style Code: CMA30177

Features:

90% polyester, 10% elastane

Internal drawcords

Adjustable toggles at cuffs

Reflective zipper pockets with heat seal application

Castore branding at left thigh

Description:

Revolutionise your rest days with these Men’s Flex Woven Cargo Joggers. Crafted from a unique blend of polyester and elastane, these Joggers guarantee flexible durability – meanwhile, zipper pockets provide a secure solution for storing small items on the go. Details matter – that’s why the Castore logo is printed at the left thigh in a reflective silver colour for low-light visibility.

Stylecode: CMC10748

Low to moderate support

Scoop neckline

Ergonomically placed straps

Removable cups

Remain comfortable during low-impact training with this premium-quality Sports Bra from our Ore Capsule collection. Its removable cups, scoop neckline and thoughtfully placed straps ensure optimal comfort to and from your sessions as well.

Style code: CF0577

Features:

Breathable, lightweight, moisture-wicking fabric

Mesh ventilation for improved breathability at back and sides

Scoop neckline

Sleeveless silhouette

Coverstitch across seams for flat non-chafing finish and reinforced strength

Reflective dots at lower back

Castore branding at chest and upper back

Our Women’s Breathable Performance Tank Top is reinforced with coverstitching for durability through intense movement and close-fitting comfort for a lean look and feel. Mesh panelling in key sweat zones and sweat-wicking fabric keep you cool under pressure, giving you that extra edge when you need it most.

Style Code: CFB30564

Features:

Breathable, lightweight, wicking fabric

Aeromesh panels for enhanced breathability

Sleeveless silhouette

Reflective Castore branding at chest and centre back

Airex tertiary branding at lower right back

Gain an edge in our Women’s Lightweight Panelled Tank Top, engineered with Airex panels for ultimate breathability when you’re pushing the limit. Enhanced with a wicked finish to keep moisture away when you’re performing. While reflective branding at chest and centre back ensures you stay seen no matter the time of day.

· Best for High-impact training.

Style Code: CFC30709
